basics.name: Florian Bastin
basics.label: Gen AI Engineer
basics.summary: I am a Gen AI Engineer with expertise in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Generative AI. I have developed robust data architectures, pipelines, and Gen AI use cases for various clients, and I teach Generative AI & GCP Cloud at Dauphine Tunis University.
